NFC starting quarterback Michael Vick of Philadelphia probably appreciates his appearance more than anyone on either side of the ball, considering how far he has come since serving prison time for his role in dogfighting operation. This one feels great due to the fact that I've been through so much and trained to getting back to this position, he said earlier this week. "It's paramount for me and my family and I'm just thankful."

But the prime minister did accept that the pressure had made it difficult for him to do the job at 110%. Welch explained the date change Vermont seeks to enable a swifter move toward a singlepayer system meshes with flexibility conservative politicians might also like because of their opposition to federal control of health care. My argument to them is why not let states experiment? So it is a state's rights argument, Welch said. Sen. Bernie Sanders added that the date change wouldn't cost the federal government anything extra, doesn't mention the word singlepayer but would hold states to all the requirements of the law.
